meta.purpose: Structured knowledge base of all sources, facts, and gaps for the Intersect Mirror dashboard.

sources.name: Intersect Official Website
sources.description: Main site for Intersect MBO. Contains committee descriptions, membership info, news, and governance docs.
sources.notes: Team page returned 404 as of Feb 2026 — full staff roster unavailable.

sources.name: Intersect Knowledge Base / Docs
sources.description: Official documentation: committee mandates, election procedures, governance framework, parameter committee info.
sources.notes: Committee member lists NOT included in docs — major gap.

sources.name: Intersect X / Twitter (@IntersectMBO)
sources.description: Official X account. Announcements on hires, committee updates, events, partnerships.
sources.notes: Key source for staff hires (Feb 13, 2026 update), enterprise member announcements, office hours.

sources.name: Intersect GitHub
sources.description: Open source repos, budget proposals, committee work packages.
sources.notes: Budget committee proposals visible. Bug bounty program with TxPipe referenced.

sources.name: Cardano Foundation Blog
sources.description: CF blog post on joining Intersect (Sep 2024). Frederik Gregaard statements.

sources.name: EMURGO Blog / Posts
sources.description: EMURGO announcements. Nikhil Joshi (COO) as Intersect board member.

sources.name: IOG / IOHK Blog
sources.description: IOG updates. Gerard Moroney (COO) as Intersect board member.

sources.name: Reddit — Intersect Committee Recordings
sources.description: Committee meeting recordings shared on Reddit. OSC meetings (Feb 5, Jan 22 2026), TSC discussions.
sources.notes: Recordings exist but no official archive. Elaine identified as possible OSC Chair from meetings.

sources.name: Cardano Forum
sources.description: Community discussions on budget proposals, committee elections, governance.
sources.notes: Budget Committee proposals discussed here.

sources.name: GovTool (Cardano Governance)
sources.description: On-chain governance tool for DRep delegation, voting, and governance actions.
sources.notes: Used for committee elections. No per-member vote data extracted yet — gap.

sources.name: Sam Leathers (@therealdisasm) — X
sources.description: Special Technical Advisor. Posts on tech coordination and Cardano security.
sources.notes: Confirmed role Feb 13, 2026.

sources.name: Mike Hornan (@Hornan7) — X
sources.description: Security Incident Manager. Posts on vulnerability handling.
sources.notes: Confirmed role Feb 13, 2026.

sources.name: Lally McClay (@LallyMcClay) — X
sources.description: Head of Ecosystem & Community. Promoted from Governance Lead.
sources.notes: Confirmed role Feb 13, 2026.

sources.name: Intersect Testimonials Page
sources.description: Member testimonials. Source for Sricharan Ganta (Nucast), Andreas Sosilo, Yuri Kuriyama, Rafael Cardoso, Georg Link.
sources.notes: Only testimonials — not a comprehensive member list.

sources.name: Cardano Summit Recaps
sources.description: Annual summit. Adam Rusch mentioned in governance workshops.

sources.name: LinkedIn Profiles
sources.description: Professional profiles for Jack Briggs, Nikhil Joshi. Background verification.
sources.notes: No salary data available.

sources.name: Cardano Blockchain Explorer (CardanoScan)
sources.description: On-chain data: treasury transactions, governance actions, DRep votes.
sources.notes: Could provide treasury flow data, governance action IDs. NOT currently integrated.

sources.name: CExplorer Governance
sources.description: Governance explorer: DRep list, governance actions, committee votes.
sources.notes: Rich governance data NOT yet integrated. Could enrich election turnout, DRep participation.

sources.name: Intersect Budget Proposals (GitHub)
sources.description: Budget committee repo with formal proposals, work packages, and committee funding requests.
sources.notes: Per-committee budget breakdowns available but NOT yet extracted into our data.

sources.name: Midnight Foundation
sources.description: Enterprise member since Dec 2025. Privacy sidechain collaboration.

sources.name: Intersect Q4 2025 Election Results
sources.description: Official Q4 2025 committee election results: 293 voters (19.4% turnout), 5182 ballots, 98 candidates, 36 seats across 8 committees. Audited by Dquadrant.
sources.notes: Full per-candidate vote counts extracted. Audit by Dquadrant (Netherlands-based Web3 firm).

sources.name: Cardano Constitution (GitHub)
sources.description: Full text of the ratified Cardano constitution. Defines governance guardrails, DRep roles, treasury rules, parameter bounds.
sources.notes: Ratified Dec 2024 at Buenos Aires Constitutional Convention. CIP-1694 basis.

sources.name: Intersect Budget Committee Docs
sources.description: Full 2025 budget proposal with per-committee breakdowns, work packages, treasury withdrawal schedule.
sources.notes: Extracted: TSC ₳99.4M, OSC ₳5.9M, CPC ₳27.2M, CCC ₳11.3M, CBC ₳1.9M, GMC ₳20.4M, MCC ₳77.5M, Intersect Ops ₳20M.

sources.name: Cardano Foundation Governance 2025 Reflection
sources.description: CF blog: 100% voting record as DRep, ICC tenure completed, 140M ADA delegated to 7 DReps, 220M ADA to 11 more in Jan 2026.
sources.notes: Key source for CF governance delegation strategy and DRep concentration risks.

sources.name: CExplorer: How Decentralized is Cardano Governance?
sources.description: Analysis of DRep delegation: 6.23B ADA total, 68% to Abstain DRep, top 10 DReps include CF and EMURGO.
sources.notes: 105.4K individuals delegated to Abstain; only ~32% of voting power actively delegated.

sources.name: OSC Meeting Recordings (YouTube)
sources.description: Public YouTube recordings of Open Source Committee meetings. Only committee with consistent public recordings.
sources.notes: Feb 5 2026, Jan 8 2026, Feb 20 2025 recordings found. Attendees extracted from minutes.

sources.name: TSC Docs & Meeting Minutes
sources.description: TSC mandate, meeting minutes, technical roadmap. Covers delivery assurance, hard fork coordination, tender processes.
sources.notes: Minutes available for 2025; no YouTube recordings.

sources.name: Budget Committee Weekly Minutes
sources.description: Weekly budget committee meeting minutes covering NCL models, proposal submissions, vendor coordination.
sources.notes: Detailed minutes from Mar 2025 onward.

sources.name: Dquadrant Election Audit
sources.description: Independent audit of Q4 2025 election votes: schema validation, eligibility checks, timing verification, tally reconciliation.

sources.name: Cardano Net Change Limit Explainer
sources.description: Explains the Net Change Limit mechanism that governs maximum treasury withdrawal per epoch.

sources.name: Intersect Constitution Page
sources.description: Intersect's tracking page for the Cardano constitution journey, CIP-169, and ratification process.

sources.name: Cardano 6B ADA Governance Milestone
sources.description: Reports 6B+ ADA delegated to DReps as governance milestone.

sources.name: Budget Proposal Master Spreadsheet
sources.description: Full transparency master spreadsheet with per-committee budget numbers for 2025.
sources.notes: Google Sheet with all committee budgets in one place.

facts.claim: Intersect administers ~300M ADA treasury (2025 budget: 263.6M ADA)
Jack Briggs appointed Executive Director Jan 2026 (from Interim)
Board has 4 Non-Executive Directors: Nikhil Joshi, Gerard Moroney, Adam Rusch, Kavinda Kariyapperuma
9 standing committees: TSC, OSC, Civics, Budget, Product, GMC, MCC, Oversight, Parameter
Committee elections are biannual; 50% of seats rotate per cycle
1,800+ paid members, 2,700+ associates
Cardano Foundation joined Intersect Sep 2024
IOG (Gerard Moroney) and EMURGO (Nikhil Joshi) are founding entities with board overlap
Midnight Foundation joined as enterprise member Dec 2025
Serviceplan Group joined as enterprise member Dec 2025
Chain Partition incident Nov 2025; TSC WG published review Jan 2026
Sam Leathers, Mike Hornan, Lally McClay roles confirmed Feb 13, 2026
Rosie Graham hired as Head of People & Culture Jan 2026
Nick Cook serves as Interim Director of Operations
Elaine confirmed as OSC Chair (Aira Corp CTO) from meeting minutes
Q4 2025 election: 293 voters (19.4% turnout), 5182 ballots, 98 candidates, 36 seats
Oversight Committee is new for 2026 — no public reports yet
No public salary or stipend ranges disclosed for any role
Team page on intersectmbo.org returned 404
Committee member lists not published in official docs (but extractable from election results)
2025 Core Budget: TSC ₳99.4M + OSC ₳5.9M = ₳125.3M total
2025 Research Budget: CPC ₳27.2M
2025 Governance Support: CCC ₳11.3M + CBC ₳1.9M = ₳13.2M
2025 Growth & Marketing Budget: GMC ₳20.4M
2025 Innovation Budget: MCC ₳77.5M (incl. ₳75.5M Community Hubs)
Intersect seeks ₳20M for admin ops, replacing 5% Delivery Assurance fee
6.23B ADA delegated to DReps; 68% to Abstain DRep (105.4K individuals)
Top 10 DReps include CF and EMURGO — governance concentration risk
CF delegated 140M ADA to 7 Developer/Builder DReps (20M each) in 2025
CF delegated 220M ADA to 11 Adoption/Operations DReps in Jan 2026
CF total delegation: 360M ADA to 18 community DReps
Cardano Constitution ratified Dec 2024 at Buenos Aires Convention
Treasury holds ~1.7B ADA; governed by Net Change Limit per epoch
TSC core maintenance contract: IOE call-off $9.75M (Feb–Jul), open tender afterward
Election audit performed by Dquadrant: schema validation, eligibility checks, tally reconciliation
Only OSC has public YouTube meeting recordings; 5 of 10 committees have no public archives
Nicolas Cerny (CF Governance Lead) top vote-getter in CBC election with 176 votes
Samuel Leathers elected CPC Chair with 168 votes; also serves as Special Technical Advisor
Kevin Hammond (node dev since 2019) top TSC vote-getter with 160 votes
Plomin Hard Fork (Jan 2025) activated full on-chain governance

enrichment_opportunities.action: Integrate CardanoScan/CExplorer API for treasury transactions and governance actions
enrichment_opportunities.result: DRep stats, treasury data, governance milestones extracted to governance-stats.json

enrichment_opportunities.action: Extract per-committee budget from GitHub budget-committee repo
enrichment_opportunities.result: Full 2025 budget breakdown in budget-2025.json: 6 buckets, 8 committee allocations, withdrawal schedule

enrichment_opportunities.action: Extract election data from Intersect official results
enrichment_opportunities.result: All 36 elected candidates with vote counts in elections-2025.json; committee members updated in input.json

enrichment_opportunities.action: Pull DRep delegation and voting stats from CExplorer governance
enrichment_opportunities.result: 6.23B ADA delegated, 68% abstain rate, CF 360M delegation stats in governance-stats.json

enrichment_opportunities.action: Collect and link all public meeting recordings (Reddit, YouTube)
enrichment_opportunities.result: meeting-archives.json: 3 OSC YouTube recordings, TSC/ISC/CBC minutes links, gap analysis

enrichment_opportunities.action: Index constitution clauses relevant to transparency/governance
enrichment_opportunities.result: Constitution metadata, governance roles, action types, guardrails in governance-stats.json

enrichment_opportunities.action: Enriched committee member bios from election results and meeting minutes
enrichment_opportunities.result: 48 named committee members with bios in elections-2025.json

enrichment_opportunities.action: Cross-reference X followers, forum contributors for broader member data
enrichment_opportunities.result: Added elected committee members; broader member scraping deferred

budget.status: per-committee breakdown complete for 2025; 2026 data pending
